title: Custom Ghostty Terminal
description: My customised install of Ghostty terminal. Contains some useful plugins using Zinit and configs for other CLI tools.

title: Doc Conv
description: A markdown document converter CLI tool built using Pandoc. Converts markdown to various formats including PDF, DOCX.

title: Pawpedia
description: A pet tracking and care app built as part of a group for the unit CAB302 - Agile Software Engineering at QUT.

title: Visual Studio Code Config
description: A curated set of extensions, UI tweaks and settings for Visual Studio Code to enhance productivity and coding experience.

title: Neovim Config
description: A highly customised Neovim configuration with various plugins and settings for an optimal coding experience.
